existing_features.title: Update the Dashboard header so the user name line displays a greeting in English as "Hello, <name>" with a small icon/sign placed next to the greeting text (e.g., a Lucide icon), instead of showing only the raw name.

Move the weekly and monthly result countdown indicators (e.g., "X days before weekly result" and "Y days before monthly result") into the same greeting section next to/under "Hello, <name>" in the Dashboard header, and remove the existing weekly/monthly countdown indicators that are currently displayed below the app name section.

Avoid duplicate greetings by ensuring only one greeting is shown on the Dashboard screen (either in the Dashboard header or inside the LiveCalendarWidget), keeping the greeting located where the user requested (next to the name in the Dashboard header).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update UI header: add a greeting next to the user name ("Hello, <name>"); move weekly/monthly results into that section; remove weekly/monthly results from below the app name

projectName: Move weekly/monthly result indicators into greeting next to user name
